html:
{% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{{doc.name}}
{% else %}

{{doc.name}}

{%- endif %}
{% if doc.appointment %}
: {{doc.appointment}}
{%- endif -%}
{% if doc.patient %}
: {{doc.patient_name}}
{% else %}
: Patient Name
{%- endif -%}
: {{doc.patient_age}}
: {{doc.patient_sex}}
{% if doc.practitioner %}
: {{doc.practitioner_name}}
{%- endif -%}
{% if doc.encounter_date %}
: {{doc.encounter_date}}
{%- endif -%} {% if doc.encounter_time %}
: {{doc.encounter_time}}
{%- endif -%} {% if doc.visit_department %}
: {{doc.visit_department}}
{%- endif -%}
{% if doc.symptoms_in_print%} {% if doc.symptoms %} Complaints: {{doc.symptoms}}
{%- endif -%} {%- endif -%} {% if doc.diagnosis_in_print%} {% if doc.diagnosis %} Diagnosis: {{doc.diagnosis}}
{%- endif -%} {%- endif -%}
{% if doc.drug_prescription %}
Rx, {%- for row in doc.drug_prescription -%} {%- endfor -%}
{%- if row.drug_name -%}{{ row.drug_name }}{%- endif -%} {%- if row.dosage -%}{{ row.dosage }}{%- endif -%} {%- if row.period -%}{{ row.period }}{%- endif -%}
{%- if row.comment -%}{{ row.comment }}{%- endif -%}
{%- endif -%}
{% if doc.lab_test_prescription %} Investigations, {%- for row in doc.lab_test_prescription -%} {%- endfor -%}
{%- if row.lab_test_name -%}{{ row.lab_test_name }}{%- endif -%}
{%- if row.lab_test_comment -%}{{ row.lab_test_comment }}{%- endif -%}
{%- endif -%}
{% if doc.encounter_comment %}
{{doc.encounter_comment}} {%- endif -%}
name: CMH Encounter
